E

Effect - Class in io.github.rowak
A local interface for an Aurora Effect.
Effect() - Constructor for class io.github.rowak.Effect
 
Effect.Color - Class in io.github.rowak
Represents a single color in an effect's palette.
Effect.Direction - Enum in io.github.rowak
The available effect direction types.
Note: If a direction is missing, please create an issue on Github.
Effect.Frame - Class in io.github.rowak
Stores an frame's RGBW color and transition time.
Effect.Type - Enum in io.github.rowak
The availbale effect types.
Note: The plugin type is for user-made plugin effect types.
EffectBuilder - Interface in io.github.rowak.effectbuilder
The EffectBuilder model for the six primary Aurora effect types.
effects() - Method in class io.github.rowak.Aurora
Returns the Aurora's Effects object which contains methods for accessing and modifying effects information.
Effects() - Constructor for class io.github.rowak.Aurora.Effects
 
enable() - Method in class io.github.rowak.Aurora.ExternalStreaming
Enables external streaming mode over UDP.
ExplodeEffectBuilder - Class in io.github.rowak.effectbuilder
A small helper class for easily creating new explode-type effects.
ExplodeEffectBuilder() - Constructor for class io.github.rowak.effectbuilder.ExplodeEffectBuilder
Creates an instance of the ExplodeEffectBuilder
externalStreaming() - Method in class io.github.rowak.Aurora
Returns the Aurora's ExternalStreaming object which contains methods for controlling the external streaming feature of the Aurora.
ExternalStreaming() - Constructor for class io.github.rowak.Aurora.ExternalStreaming
